title: Summaries takeaways
description: Represents the takeaways of an article summary, consisting of whether this summary is approved, the model used, the last generated date, and the summary text items themsevles.

approved.description: Whether these summary takeaways are approved

items.description: The text entries of this summary

model_id.description: The model used to generate these summaries

last_generated_date.description: The timestamp this summary was last generated
